product_name: Mountain Hardwear Mighty Power 3/4 Tights - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: These high-performance tights offer fast-drying and stretchy comfort for running or cross training. Wick.QTM fabric keeps you dry and zoned mesh panels give you high breathability.
short_description: These high-performance tights offer fast-drying and stretchy comfort for running or cross training. Wick.QTM fabric keeps you dry and zoned mesh panels give you high breathability.
